Introducing Genius, the must-have Chrome extension for every savvy shopper! Easily enhance your online shopping experience by seamlessly extracting and organizing product information from your favourite online stores. With Genius, you can effortlessly save and categorize items you love in one convenient place.

ðŸŒŸ Key Features:
âœ¨ Extract & Save: On any product page, simply click the Genius icon, and watch as it automatically captures essential details, including product images, titles, store information, and prices. Say goodbye to manual copying and pasting!

âœ¨ Personalized Categories: Create custom categories that align with your shopping interests and priorities. Organize your saved items in a way that makes sense to you. Whether it's 'Fashion Finds,' 'Tech Gadgets,' or 'Home Decor,' Genius has got you covered.

âœ¨ Seamless Integration: Genius is designed to work seamlessly with our website, the ultimate platform for organizing your wishlists. Easily transfer your saved items to your account for a clutter-free, well-organized shopping experience.

âœ¨ Visual Shopping: The extension's intuitive interface presents your saved items in a visually appealing grid, making it easy to spot your most-wanted products at a glance.

âœ¨ Save Time & Stay Organized: No more sifting through endless tabs and bookmarks. Genius keeps your shopping spree well-structured, so you can spend more time exploring, less time managing.

Upgrade your online shopping game with Genius! Try it now, and experience a new level of convenience and organization in your shopping journey. Happy shopping!
